turns.content: Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't hang up, we need to talk about something important. It's Agent Thomas Mitchell here from the IRS. We've been trying to reach you all day about an urgent matter regarding your taxes. Have you had a chance to look at any of our letters or emails?

Oh, hello there. This is Walter. I haven't received any letters or emails like that, AgentThomas, right?
I'm living on a fixed income and sometimes things get lost in the mail. How can I help with this urgent matter you mentioned? But tell me, why does it need to be sorted out so quickly?

Thank you for answering, Grandpa Walter. Sometimes our emails and letters can end up in spam folders or get overlooked. This is a very serious matter. You have an outstanding balance of unpaid taxes totaling $4850. If this isn't resolved immediately, I'm going to have to place you under arrest as soon as we hang up.
I understand about the fixed income; that's why I am working with you right now instead of waiting for a reply. We need to resolve this today while I'm still available and before my colleagues get involved who aren't as flexible.
To avoid any legal trouble, all we need is for you to make full payment using gift cards from CVS or Walmart. Head straight out there, buy the cards, and call us back with the numbers on them. This will clear your name and prevent any arrests that would disrupt your life.
Do you have any questions before I go ahead and provide more details?
